list.title: Image
list.description: An instance of Image represents an image to be displayed on a Page or Key.

list.title: Image.Source
list.description:
An image Image.Source can be any of the following;

  • An image file path string to be loaded by sharp - constructor.
  • An image Buffer to be loaded by sharp - constructor.
  • An existing Image instance.
  • An Array of Image.Sources.
  • An Object with the following properties, requiring at least one of the first three properties;

list.title: Image.Color
list.description:
A Image.Color can be any of the following;

  • A color name string recognized by the external:colornames library.
  • An rgb(a) hexadecimal color string, with or without a leading #. (e.g. 0f0, 0f0f, #00ff00, #00ff00ff)
  • An Array of numbers with a length of either 3 or 4, each value being between 0 and 255 inclusive.
  • An Object with the following color channel properties;

list.title: Image.FrameData
list.description: An Object containing frame data for an Image.

list.title: Image#WIDTH
list.description: The width of the Image in pixels.

list.title: Image#HEIGHT
list.description: The height of the Image in pixels.

list.title: Image#SPLIT_FRAMES
list.description: An Object describing the dimensions used to generate split frames.

list.title: Image#SCALE_FRAMES
list.description: The scale used to generate scaled frames.

list.title: Image#SOURCE
list.description: The Image.Source used to create the Image.

list.title: Image#metadata
list.description:
An Object populated with metadata generated by external:sharp.

See sharp - metadata.

list.title: Image#frameCount
list.description: The number of frames in the Image.

list.title: Image#currentFrame
list.description: The index of the current frame in the Image.

list.title: Image#loopCount
list.description: The number of times the Image loops.

list.title: Image#currentLoop
list.description: The current loop number of the Image.

list.title: Image#loadTime
list.description: The number of milliseconds the Image took to load.

list.title: Image#destroyed
list.description: Whether or not the Image has been destroyed.

list.title: Image#event:sharpLoaded
list.description: Sharp loaded event fired after sources have been loaded and composited into the external:sharp instance.

list.title: Image#event:frameLoaded
list.description: Frame loaded event fired after each frame is loaded.

list.title: Image#event:imageLoaded
list.description: Image loaded event fired after the final frame is loaded.

list.title: Image#event:frameUpdated
list.description: Frame updated event fired when Image#currentFrame has changed.

list.title: Image#event:error
list.description: Error event fired when an error occurs.

list.title: Image#event:destroy
list.description: Destroy event fired when the Image is destroyed.

list.title: Image#sharp
list.description: Get a clone of the external:sharp instance of the Image.

list.title: Image#getFrame
list.description: Get the Image.FrameData of the current image frame. If the current frame has not yet loaded returns null.

list.title: Image#startAnimation
list.description: Starts the Image's animation if Image#frameCount is greater than 1, otherwise this is a no-op.

list.title: Image#stopAnimation
list.description: Stops the Image's animation if Image#frameCount is greater than 1, otherwise this is a no-op.

list.title: Image#nextFrame
list.description: Progresses the Image's animation 1 frame, skipping the delay, if Image#frameCount is greater than 1, otherwise this is a no-op.

list.title: Image#setCurrentFrame
list.description: Set the Image#currentFrame of the Image.

list.title: Image#resetAnimation
list.description: Reset the Image's Image#currentFrame and Image#currentLoop if Image#frameCount is greater than 1, otherwise this is a no-op.

list.title: Image#destroy
list.description: Clean up all internal state data used by the Image in preparation for garbage collection.

list.title: module:streamdeck-ui-node
list.description: The streamdeck-ui-node module returned as an Object when importing the library.

list.title: module:streamdeck-ui-node.StreamDeckInfo
list.description: An Object describing a connected Stream Deck device.

list.title: module:streamdeck-ui-node.StreamDeckModel
list.description:
A short string describing a Stream Deck model.

Can be one of: 'original', 'originalv2', 'original-mk2', 'mini', 'miniv2', 'xl', 'xlv2', 'pedal', 'plus'

list.title: module:streamdeck-ui-node.StreamDeckOptions
list.description: A Object holding options for creating a StreamDeck instance.

list.title: module:streamdeck-ui-node.listStreamDecks
list.description: Get information on connected Stream Deck devices.

list.title: module:streamdeck-ui-node.openStreamDeck
list.description: Open the first Stream Deck device listed by module:streamdeck-ui-node.listStreamDecks.

list.title: module:streamdeck-ui-node.openStreamDeck(2)
list.description: Open the first Stream Deck device listed by module:streamdeck-ui-node.listStreamDecks that matches the given HID path or module:streamdeck-ui-node.StreamDeckModel.

list.title: module:streamdeck-ui-node.manageStreamDeck
list.description: Manage user interface elements on a Stream Deck already opened by external:@elgato-stream-deck/node.

list.title: Key
list.description: An instance of Key represents a virtual key on a Page created via StreamDeck#createKey.

list.title: Key#STREAMDECK
list.description: The StreamDeck that created the Key.

list.title: Key#STREAMDECK_NODE
list.description: The external:@elgato-stream-deck/node instance managed by the StreamDeck that created the Key.

list.title: Key#KEY_COUNT
list.description: The number of keys on the Stream Deck.

list.title: Key#KEY_WIDTH
list.description: The width of each key on the Stream Deck in pixels.

list.title: Key#KEY_HEIGHT
list.description: The height of each key on the Stream Deck in pixels.

list.title: Key#HOLD_TIME
list.description: The number of milliseconds after the Key#event:down is triggered that the Key#event:hold will be triggered. A value of 0 means the Key#event:hold is disabled. If undefined Page#hold events will be allowed to propagate from Pages that the Key is attached to.

list.title: Key#PRESS_TIME
list.description: The number of milliseconds after the Key#event:down is triggered that the press scaling effect will apply. A value of 0 means the press scaling effect lasts until the Key#event:up is triggered.

list.title: Key#PRESS_SCALE
list.description: The default scale the Key will use for the press scaling effect. A value of 1 means the press scaling effect is disabled.

list.title: Key#IDLE_TIME
list.description: The number of milliseconds of inactivity before the Key#event:idle is triggered. A value of 0 means the Key#event:idle is disabled.

list.title: Key#backgroundImage
list.description: The background image of the Key.

list.title: Key#image
list.description: The image of the Key.

list.title: Key#destroyed
list.description: Whether or not the Key has been destroyed.

list.title: Key#event:focus
list.description: Focus event fired when any Page that the Key is attached to gains focus.

list.title: Key#event:blur
list.description: Blur event fired when any Page that the Key is attached to loses focus.

list.title: Key#event:attach
list.description: Attach event fired when the Key is attached to a Page.

list.title: Key#event:detach
list.description: Detach event fired when the Key is detached from a Page.

list.title: Key#event:down
list.description: Down event fired when a key is pressed and a Page that the Key is attached to has focus.

list.title: Key#event:hold
list.description: Hold event fired when a key is pressed down for Key#HOLD_TIME milliseconds. If Key#HOLD_TIME is 0 this event is disabled. If Key#HOLD_TIME is undefined Page#hold events will be allowed to propagate from the Page that the Key is attached to.

list.title: Key#event:up
list.description: Up event fired when a key is released and a Page that the Key is attached to had focus when it was initially pressed.

list.title: Key#event:click
list.description: Click event fired after the Key#event:up if the Key#event:hold had not been fired.

list.title: Key#event:held
list.description: Held event fired after the Key#event:up if the Key#event:hold had been fired.

list.title: Key#event:activity
list.description: Activity event fired after a user interacts with the Stream Deck device's keys while a Page that the Key is attached to has or gains focus.

list.title: Key#event:idle
list.description: Idle event fired after Key#IDLE_TIME milliseconds of inactivity. If Key#IDLE_TIME is 0 this event is disabled.

list.title: Key#event:error
list.description: Error event fired when an error occurs.

list.title: Key#event:create
list.description: Create event fired when the Key is created.

list.title: Key#event:destroy
list.description: Destroy event fired when the Key is destroyed.

list.title: Key#isPressed
list.description: Returns whether or not the Key is pressed down.

list.title: Key#createBackgroundImage
list.description: Create a new Image with a width of Key#KEY_WIDTH and a height of Key#KEY_HEIGHT.

list.title: Key#setBackgroundImage
list.description: Set the background image of the Key. If no image argument is passed this is the same as calling Key#clearBackgroundImage.

list.title: Key#clearBackgroundImage
list.description: Clear the background image of the Key.

list.title: Key#getBackgroundFrame
list.description: Get the current frame of the background image for the Key. If no background image is set or if the background image frame has not yet loaded returns null.

list.title: Key#createImage
list.description: Create a new Image with a width of Key#KEY_WIDTH and a height of Key#KEY_HEIGHT. The newly created Image will have scaled frames if applicable.

list.title: Key#setImage
list.description: Set the image of the Key. If no image argument is passed this is the same as calling Key#clearImage.

list.title: Key#clearImage
list.description: Clear the image of the Key.

list.title: Key#getFrame
list.description: Get the current frame of the image for the Page. If no image is set or if the image frame has not yet loaded returns null.

list.title: Key#draw
list.description: Draw the Key to the Stream Deck's panel.

list.title: Key#destroy
list.description: Clean up all internal state data used by the Key in preparation for garbage collection and detach from all Pages.

list.title: Page
list.description: An instance of Page represents a virtual page on a StreamDeck's panel created via StreamDeck#createPage.

list.title: Page#STREAMDECK
list.description: The StreamDeck that created the Page.

list.title: Page#STREAMDECK_NODE
list.description: The external:@elgato-stream-deck/node instance managed by the StreamDeck that created the Page.

list.title: Page#KEY_COUNT
list.description: The number of keys on the Stream Deck.

list.title: Page#KEY_WIDTH
list.description: The width of each key on the Stream Deck in pixels.

list.title: Page#KEY_HEIGHT
list.description: The height of each key on the Stream Deck in pixels.

list.title: Page#PANEL_ROW_COUNT
list.description: The number of rows on the Stream Deck's panel.

list.title: Page#PANEL_COLUMN_COUNT
list.description: The number of columns on the Stream Deck's panel.

list.title: Page#PANEL_WIDTH
list.description: The width of all panel columns on the Stream Deck combined in pixels.

list.title: Page#PANEL_HEIGHT
list.description: The height of all panel rows on the Stream Deck combined in pixels.

list.title: Page#HOLD_TIME
list.description: The number of milliseconds after the Page#event:down is triggered that the Page#event:hold will be triggered. A value of 0 means the Page#event:hold is disabled. If undefined StreamDeck#hold events will be allowed to propagate from the StreamDeck that created the Page.

list.title: Page#IDLE_TIME
list.description: The number of milliseconds of inactivity before the Page#event:idle is triggered. A value of 0 means the Page#event:idle is disabled.

list.title: Page#brightness
list.description: The brightness of Stream Deck's panel when the Page has focus. Value is a float between 0 and 1 inclusive.

list.title: Page#backgroundImage
list.description: The background image of the Page.

list.title: Page#keys
list.description: A Map of Keys currently attached to the Page, stored by key slot index.

list.title: Page#destroyed
list.description: Whether or not the Page has been destroyed.

list.title: Page#event:brightness
list.description: Brightness event fired when setting the Page's Page#brightness.

list.title: Page#event:focus
list.description: Focus event fired when the Page gains focus.

list.title: Page#event:blur
list.description: Blur event fired when the Page loses focus.

list.title: Page#event:attach
list.description: Attach event fired when a Key is attached to the Page.

list.title: Page#event:detach
list.description: Detach event fired when a Key is detached from the Page.

list.title: Page#event:down
list.description: Down event fired when a key is pressed and the Page has focus.

list.title: Page#event:hold
list.description: Hold event fired when a key is pressed down for Page#HOLD_TIME milliseconds. If Page#HOLD_TIME is 0 this event is disabled. If Page#HOLD_TIME is undefined StreamDeck#hold events will be allowed to propagate from the StreamDeck that created the Page.

list.title: Page#event:up
list.description: Up event fired when a key is released and the Page had focus when it was initially pressed.

list.title: Page#event:click
list.description: Click event fired after the Page#event:up if the Page#event:hold had not been fired.

list.title: Page#event:held
list.description: Held event fired after the Page#event:up if the Page#event:hold had been fired.

list.title: Page#event:activity
list.description: Activity event fired after a user interacts with the Stream Deck device's keys while the Page has focus or when the Page gains focus.

list.title: Page#event:idle
list.description: Idle event fired after Page#IDLE_TIME milliseconds of inactivity. If Page#IDLE_TIME is 0 this event is disabled.

list.title: Page#event:error
list.description: Error event fired when an error occurs.

list.title: Page#event:create
list.description: Create event fired when the Page is created.

list.title: Page#event:destroy
list.description: Destroy event fired when the Page is destroyed.

list.title: Page#setBrightness
list.description: Set the brightness of the Stream Deck's panel. If no brightness value is given the StreamDeck that created the Page will be allowed to use it's StreamDeck#brightness value instead.

list.title: Page#focus
list.description: Set the StreamDeck#focusedPage of the StreamDeck that created the Page to the Page.

list.title: Page#blur
list.description: Set the StreamDeck#focusedPage of the StreamDeck that created the Page to the StreamDeck#defaultPage if the Page has focus.

list.title: Page#attachKey
list.description: Attach a Key to the first free key slot on the Page.

list.title: Page#attachKey(2)
list.description: Attach a Key to a key slot index on the Page.

list.title: Page#attachKey(3)
list.description: Attach a Key to key slot coordinates on the Page.

list.title: Page#detachKey
list.description: Detach a Key from the first key slot index to which the Key is attached on the Page.

list.title: Page#detachKey(2)
list.description: Detach a Key from a key slot index on the Page.

list.title: Page#detachKey(3)
list.description: Detach a Key from key slot coordinates on the Page.

list.title: Page#createBackgroundImage
list.description: Create a new Image with a width of Page#PANEL_WIDTH and a height of Page#PANEL_HEIGHT. The created Image will have split frames.

list.title: Page#setBackgroundImage
list.description: Set the background image of the Page. If no image argument is passed this is the same as calling Page#clearBackgroundImage.

list.title: Page#clearBackgroundImage
list.description: Clear the background image of the Page.

list.title: Page#getBackgroundFrame
list.description: Get the current frame of the background image for the Page. If no background image is set or if the background image frame has not yet loaded returns null.

list.title: Page#draw
list.description: Draw the Page to the Stream Deck's panel.

list.title: Page#destroy
list.description: Clean up all internal state data used by the Page in preparation for garbage collection and detach all attached Keys.

list.title: StreamDeck
list.description: An instance of StreamDeck represents a Stream Deck device accessed via module:streamdeck-ui-node.openStreamDeck or module:streamdeck-ui-node.manageStreamDeck.

list.title: StreamDeck#STREAMDECK_NODE
list.description: The external:@elgato-stream-deck/node instance managed by the StreamDeck.

list.title: StreamDeck#HID_PATH
list.description: The HID path of the Stream Deck device.

list.title: StreamDeck#MODEL
list.description: The module:streamdeck-ui-node.StreamDeckModel of the Stream Deck device.

list.title: StreamDeck#PRODUCT_NAME
list.description: The product name of the Stream Deck device.

list.title: StreamDeck#SERIAL_NUMBER
list.description: The serial number found on the Stream Deck device.

list.title: StreamDeck#FIRMWARE_VERSION
list.description: The firmware version on the Stream Deck device.

list.title: StreamDeck#KEY_COUNT
list.description: The number of keys on the Stream Deck.

list.title: StreamDeck#KEY_WIDTH
list.description: The width of each key on the Stream Deck in pixels.

list.title: StreamDeck#KEY_HEIGHT
list.description: The height of each key on the Stream Deck in pixels.

list.title: StreamDeck#PANEL_ROW_COUNT
list.description: The number of rows on the Stream Deck's panel.

list.title: StreamDeck#PANEL_COLUMN_COUNT
list.description: The number of columns on the Stream Deck's panel.

list.title: StreamDeck#PANEL_WIDTH
list.description: The width of all panel columns on the Stream Deck combined in pixels.

list.title: StreamDeck#PANEL_HEIGHT
list.description: The height of all panel rows on the Stream Deck combined in pixels.

list.title: StreamDeck#HOLD_TIME
list.description: The number of milliseconds after the StreamDeck#event:down is triggered that the StreamDeck#event:hold will be triggered. A value of 0 means the StreamDeck#event:hold is disabled.

list.title: StreamDeck#PRESS_TIME
list.description: The default number of milliseconds after the Key#event:down is triggered that the press scaling effect will apply on Keys created by the StreamDeck. A value of 0 means the press scaling effect last until the Key#event:up is triggered.

list.title: StreamDeck#PRESS_SCALE
list.description: The default scale any Keys created by the StreamDeck will use for the press scaling effect. A value of 1 means the press scaling effect is disabled.

list.title: StreamDeck#IDLE_TIME
list.description: The number of milliseconds of inactivity before the StreamDeck#event:idle is triggered. A value of 0 means the StreamDeck#event:idle is disabled.

list.title: StreamDeck#brightness
list.description: The brightness of Stream Deck's panel. Value is a float between 0 and 1 inclusive. Can be overridden by the StreamDeck#focusedPage if the StreamDeck#focusedPage has Page#brightness set.

list.title: StreamDeck#defaultPage
list.description: The default Page that will gain focus when the StreamDeck#focusedPage loses focus.

list.title: StreamDeck#focusedPage
list.description: The Page that currently has focus on the StreamDeck.

list.title: StreamDeck#pages
list.description: All Pages created by the StreamDeck that have not been destroyed.

list.title: StreamDeck#keys
list.description: All Keys created by the StreamDeck that have not been destroyed.

list.title: StreamDeck#destroyed
list.description: Whether or not the StreamDeck has been destroyed.

list.title: StreamDeck#event:brightness
list.description: Brightness event fired when setting the StreamDeck's StreamDeck#brightness.

list.title: StreamDeck#event:focus
list.description: Focus event fired when a Page gains focus.

list.title: StreamDeck#event:blur
list.description: Blur event fired when a Page loses focus.

list.title: StreamDeck#event:page
list.description: Page event fired when a new Page is created.

list.title: StreamDeck#event:key
list.description: Key event fired when a new Key is created.

list.title: StreamDeck#event:attach
list.description: Attach event fired when a Key is attached to a Page.

list.title: StreamDeck#event:detach
list.description: Detach event fired when a Key is detached from a Page.

list.title: StreamDeck#event:down
list.description: Down event fired when a key is pressed.

list.title: StreamDeck#event:hold
list.description: Hold event fired when a key is pressed down for StreamDeck#HOLD_TIME milliseconds. If StreamDeck#HOLD_TIME is 0 this event is disabled.

list.title: StreamDeck#event:up
list.description: Up event fired when a key is released.

list.title: StreamDeck#event:click
list.description: Click event fired after the StreamDeck#event:up if the StreamDeck#event:hold had not been fired.

list.title: StreamDeck#event:held
list.description: Held event fired after the StreamDeck#event:up if the StreamDeck#event:hold had been fired.

list.title: StreamDeck#event:activity
list.description: Activity event fired after a user interacts with the Stream Deck device or the focused Page has been changed.

list.title: StreamDeck#event:idle
list.description: Idle event fired after StreamDeck#IDLE_TIME milliseconds inactivity. If StreamDeck#IDLE_TIME is 0 this event is disabled.

list.title: StreamDeck#event:error
list.description: Error event fired when an error occurs.

list.title: StreamDeck#event:destroy
list.description: Destroy event fired when the StreamDeck is destroyed.

list.title: StreamDeck#setBrightness
list.description: Set the brightness of the Stream Deck's panel.

list.title: StreamDeck#setDefaultPage
list.description: Set the default Page for the StreamDeck.

list.title: StreamDeck#setFocusedPage
list.description: Set the Page that currently has focus on the StreamDeck.

list.title: StreamDeck#createPage
list.description: Create a new Page.

list.title: StreamDeck#createKey
list.description: Create a new Key.

list.title: StreamDeck#createPageBackgroundImage
list.description: Create a new Image with a width of StreamDeck#PANEL_WIDTH and a height of StreamDeck#PANEL_HEIGHT. The created Image will have split frames.

list.title: StreamDeck#createKeyBackgroundImage
list.description: Create a new Image with a width of StreamDeck#KEY_WIDTH and a height of StreamDeck#KEY_HEIGHT.

list.title: StreamDeck#createKeyImage
list.description: Create a new Image with a width of StreamDeck#KEY_WIDTH and a height of StreamDeck#KEY_HEIGHT. The created Image will have scaled frames if applicable.

list.title: StreamDeck#destroy
list.description: Clean up all internal state data used by the StreamDeck in preparation for garbage collection. This also destroys all Pages and Keys created by the StreamDeck.

list.title: StreamDeck#close
list.description:
Destroy the StreamDeck and all Pages and Keys created by the StreamDeck, then close StreamDeck#STREAMDECK_NODE.

Returns a Promise that resolves once StreamDeck#STREAMDECK_NODE has been closed.
